Name: Comment
User Name: This is a control block, where we can hand specific information to the software outside the drivers' blocks, and write comments

Name: Comment
User Name: Each line starting with "Comment" in the Name column can be used for free-form comments

Name: Comment
User Name: Below is the version number for the specific version of this control block: it is important that it not be changed
Version

Name: Comment
User Name: We can leave lines in this spreadsheet mostly blank, but, for each line in the control block, they MUST start with FALSE/ FALSE

Name: Comment
User Name: In order to pass parameter information to the software, we must define the type of information we want to share in the UserName column, and the actual value in the City column

Name: Comment
User Name: OneKitchen process requires a different set of control block parameters, listed below:

Name: Comment
User Name: 1. REQUIRED: tell the software where the meals and groceries are being picked up from

Name: Comment
User Name: If there is a single pickup location for both, set them both as shown above

Name: Comment
User Name: FoodSources (Meal|Grocery)

Name: Comment
User Name: If there are two pickup locations, set them as shown below:

Name: Comment
User Name: FoodSources (Meal|Grocery)

Name: Comment
User Name: 2. REQUIRED: tell the software what alternate meals are provided by the meal source, with a comma separated list

Name: Comment
User Name: AltMealOptions ()

Name: Comment
User Name: 3. REQUIRED: tell the software what alternate groceries are provided by the grocery source, with a comma separated list

Name: Comment
User Name: AltGroceryOptions ()

Name: Comment
User Name: 4. REQUIRED: tell the software what time to start each driver with a command separated list. This list must have at least as many entries as there are drivers. Accepted formats are 3:00, 3:02 PM, 21:56, 11:21 AM

Name: Comment
User Name: StartTimes ()

Name: Comment
User Name: 5. REQUIRED: tell the software who the ops manager is for the run

Name: Comment
User Name: OpsManager (UserName | Phone)

Name: Comment
User Name: Please note that the separator between the name and the number is a specific separator: |

Name: Comment
User Name: 6. REQUIRED: tell the software who is (are) the pickup manager(s). Multiple lines can be repeated for serval pickup managers:

Name: Comment
User Name: PickupManagerUserName

Name: Comment
User Name: 7. OPTIONAL: tell the software who is (are) the backup driver(s). Multiple lines can be repeated for several backup drivers:

Name: Comment
User Name: BackupDriverUserName

Name: Comment
User Name: When you are ready to request driver messages, (a) make sure the control block is there and filled, and (b) submit to "Request OneKitchen messages" in Hushworkflow
